SEARCH
Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Class RichSegmentCodec

java.lang.Object
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea.RichSegmentCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.fxmisc.richtext.model.Codec<RichSegment>
public class RichSegmentCodec extends Object implements org.fxmisc.richtext.model.Codec<RichSegment>
A Codec implementation for serializing and deserializing RichSegment objects.

Supports TextSegment and HyperlinkSegment types. Each segment is encoded with a type identifier followed by its specific data.

ImageSegment is currently unsupported and will cause an exception.

    • encode

      public void encode(DataOutputStream out, RichSegment segment) throws IOException
      Encodes a RichSegment to the provided DataOutputStream. The segment is preceded by a string identifier ("text" or "hyperlink") to indicate its type.
      Specified by:
      encode in interface org.fxmisc.richtext.model.Codec<RichSegment>
      Parameters:
      out - the output stream to write to
      segment - the segment to encode
      Throws:
      IOException - if writing fails or the segment type is unsupported

    • decode

      public RichSegment decode(DataInputStream in) throws IOException
      Decodes a RichSegment from the provided DataInputStream. Expects a type string ("text" or "hyperlink") followed by the corresponding segment data.
      Specified by:
      decode in interface org.fxmisc.richtext.model.Codec<RichSegment>
      Parameters:
      in - the input stream to read from
      Returns:
      the decoded RichSegment
      Throws:
      IOException - if the stream is empty or contains an unknown type
